Causation Chain (F050)

September 2025

Dr Gorrie removes inappropriate diagnosis (VINDICATION)

But-For Test

But for the failures to treat pain adequately (leading to sleep deprivation) and image the spine (leading to delayed diagnosis), the patient would not have suffered the seizure, sustained the fractures, gone 10 months with untreated spinal fractures, or had psychiatric label contaminate his care for 2.5 years.
